products.name: Tactical Folding Knife
products.description: High-quality tactical folding knife with a durable stainless steel blade and ergonomic G10 handle. Features a secure liner lock mechanism and reversible pocket clip.

products.name: Assisted Opening Knife
products.description: Fast and easy assisted opening knife with a sharp stainless steel blade and comfortable rubber handle. Features a secure liner lock mechanism and reversible pocket clip.

products.name: Pocket Knife
products.description: Compact and lightweight pocket knife with a sharp stainless steel blade and durable aluminum handle. Features a secure liner lock mechanism and reversible pocket clip.

products.name: Folding Knife
products.description: High-quality folding knife with a durable stainless steel blade and ergonomic G10 handle. Features a secure liner lock mechanism and reversible pocket clip.
